title.rendered: Program of Ten Avatars Lord Vishnu

content.rendered:
Program of Ten Avatars Lord Vishnu

Based on Vishnu Purana

The Supreme God of Lord Vishnu ♦ A Divine Figure of Lord Vishnu ♦ GEOKC Vaishnavism
Avatars of Lord Vishnu ♦ GEOKC’S Special Prayer & Worship

The Supreme God of Lord Vishnu

Lord Vishnu as the Preserver of the Universe

A Divine Figure of Lord Vishnu

The Worship of Lord Vishnu.

GEOKC Vaishnavism

Based on the knowledge of Vaishnavism and Vaishnavism is a tradition or one of the largest branch of Hinduism, distinguished from other schools by its worship of Vishnu or his associated avatars, principally as Rama or Krishna, as the original and supreme God. GEOKC Vaishnavism is related with Lord Krishna as the Original and Supreme God to believe with the attractive features of seeing him as Lila Avatar. This program includes: spiritual discourse, workshops, great slide shows based on a complete life sketch of Lord Krishna and all other avatars of Lord Vishnu in a series with explanations of divine stories and colorful pictures, and presentations by various artists of GEOKC Devotional Music.

Avatars of Lord Vishnu

Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu within Time Frame:

  1. Matsya Avatar (The Fish) – Satyuga
  2. Kurma Avatar (The tortoise) – Satyuga
  3. Varaha Avatar (The Boar) – Satyuga
  4. Narsimha Avatar (The Human-Lion) – Satyuga
  5. Vamena Avatar (The Dwarf) – Tretayuga
  6. Parshurama Avatar (The Angry Man, Rama with an Axe) – Tretayuga
  7. Rama Avatar (The Perfect man, King of Ayodha) – Tretayuga
  8. Krishna Avatar (The Divine Statesman) – Dwaparyuga
  9. Buddha Avatar (The enlightened One) – Kalyuga
  10. Kalki Avatar (The Mighty Warriors) – Kaliyuga

To find out more about the observance days of Avatar of Lord Vishnu, please click on the following link:

GEOKC Events

GEOKC’S Special Prayer & Worship

Prayer Offered to Lord Vishnu.

Program Hours:

Weekdays : 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
Weekends & Holidays: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM and 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
